directions: Peel, quarter lengthwise, and seed cucumbers.  Slice thinly.  Mix together with garlic.  Layer cucumber slices in a salad bowl, sprinkling each layer lightly with salt.  Let stand for 30 minutes.
Pour off the liquid that has formed, pressing cucumber firmly.  Crumble mint over cucumbers.
Beat yogurt until smooth; blend in a drizzle of olive oil if desired.  Pour over cucumbers.  Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled.
title: Cucumber And Yogurt Salad
